segments.text: I'm looking into this kitchen, a very ordinary scene at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my eyes are immediately drawn to the sink, which is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing over the front edge, pouring onto the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming quite a significant puddle on the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What really astounds me is the woman standing right there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally in the growing puddle, yet she shows absolutely no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so absorbed as to miss such a clear and present issue?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about her slipping on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to those cabinets will be extensive if it continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a disaster waiting to happen, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside provides such a stark contrast to this impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the steady drip and splash of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR
